category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA_item_type_filter
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to specify the list of item types available in TCAA for item creation. Possible values (multiple values): each value corresponds to a pattern string used to filter the list of available item types for item creation in TCAA. Example: If TCAA_item_type_filter is set to: MG3* DM* then the user will be able to create items whose item type name starts either with MG3 or DM.
